title: Sibling Advicery: Twitter Alts/Breakup
description:
Live from Stereo, Bob and Monet listen to fan submitted voicemails and bring them onto the livestream to give them their advice! What would you do if you accidentally found out your best friend has an alt twitter account for gay p*rn?! How can you own who you are and where you come from when you don't agree with the politics of your hometown? How long should it take for you to get over your ex? Tune in to hear Bob and Monét answer all these questions and much more!!
Go to LivingProof.com/SIBLING and use code SIBLING for 10% off your 1st purchase!
Go to TODAYTIX.com/rivalry and use promo code rivalry to get $10 off your first TodayTix purchase!
Visit SquareSpace.com for a free trial, and when you are ready to launch, go to SquareSpace.com/rivalry to save 10% of your first purchase of a website or domain!
Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
@BobTheDragQueen
@MonetXChange
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
